sanpham.review: The best is yet to come! Give your walls a voice with a framed poster. This aesthethic, optimistic poster will look great in your desk or in an open-space office. Painted wooden frame with passe-partout for more depth.
sanpham.chitiet:
After the iPhone Xr with good sales that have made a lot of noise, Apple continues to launch a super product 2019 named iPhone 11 64GB  - a smartphone fully upgraded from high-end design, powerful processor. to a quality camera system and outstanding battery life.

Performance topped the smartphone table

The phone is powered by a powerful Apple A13 Bionic processor , which is assembled on 7 nm process, providing strong performance and high power savings compared to its predecessor.

With the A13 processor, Apple continues to assert its No. 1 position in the current smartphone market.

Comes with the machine is a RAM capacity of 4 GB and 64 GB ROM helps the machine have completely outstanding performance. Playing games or handling heavy tasks can handle smoothly, without lag.

iPhone 11 comes preloaded with the latest iOS 13 operating system, which helps to optimize better and drastically improve improvements to bring an extremely enjoyable experience for users. All processing operations on the screen are processed quickly, almost you can not see the delay in using the machine.

sanpham.review: The best is yet to come! Give your walls a voice with a framed poster. This aesthethic, optimistic poster will look great in your desk or in an open-space office. Painted wooden frame with passe-partout for more depth.
sanpham.chitiet:
Samsung galaxy A31  is a mid- range phone but it has many of the same technologies as the high-end flagship line, such as: a hole-cut design, a good camera system, a powerful battery and a powerful configuration. .

Stylish overflow design, luxurious

The Samsung A31 screen is equipped with a 6.4-inch Infinity-O screen that fills the front with Super AMOLED panels to provide a great visual experience when watching movies, surfing the web, playing games everyday.

Despite owning a large screen, but holding the device is very easy thanks to the edge of the screen is thin to the maximum to complete an extremely meticulous and elaborate with smooth rounded corners.

Besides, the edge of the Galaxy A31 screen is curved 3D to help the glass become glossy, smooth and smooth to touch , the optical fingerprint sensor built into the screen makes unlocking extremely fast. Fast and convenient.

sanpham.review: The best is yet to come! Give your walls a voice with a framed poster. This aesthethic, optimistic poster will look great in your desk or in an open-space office. Painted wooden frame with passe-partout for more depth.
sanpham.chitiet:
OPPO A9 , the phone is considered the embodiment of beauty, the innovation that OPPO brings to users with stylish design and good quality camera clusters both front and back.

Fashion design, attract young people

OPPO smartphones have always brought a lot of new points in design style and are loved by many young people.

OPPO A9 uses an "ergonomics" design with 3D curved edges hugging the chassis to provide a comfortable grip experience for the user.

Inspired by nature, OPPO A9 smartphone is easier to attract users.

It has a large 6.53-inch screen stylized by a waterdrop-shaped rabbit ear that looks extremely delicate.

OPPO has minimized the surrounding bezels to give a display-to-body ratio of 90.70%.

sanpham.review: The best is yet to come! Give your walls a voice with a framed poster. This aesthethic, optimistic poster will look great in your desk or in an open-space office. Painted wooden frame with passe-partout for more depth.
sanpham.chitiet:
Vsmart Joy 3  is a phone in the cheap segment but still possesses modern features. The water droplet screen maximizes the display space, the huge battery capacity and the cluster of 3 professional photography cameras are the outstanding features of Vsmart Joy 3.

Cluster of 3 multi-function AI cameras

Vsmart is quite focused on the camera part with 3 cameras. 13 MP main camera, 8 MP wide-angle camera, 2 MP background erasing camera .

The camera captures every moment with professional shooting features such as background erasing, wide-angle, night shooting, HDR, etc.

The 8 MP front camera features automatic beauty, removing virtual fonts for you beautiful selfies without adjusting the application.

Outstanding design and trendy

The back is sleek design, capable of changing colors depending on the angle of light. The slightly angled camera angles make it easier to hold, creating a more refined feel for Vsmart Joy 3.

sanpham.review: The best is yet to come! Give your walls a voice with a framed poster. This aesthethic, optimistic poster will look great in your desk or in an open-space office. Painted wooden frame with passe-partout for more depth.
sanpham.chitiet:
Following the configuration strategy and features superior to the price, Realme  has officially launched the  Realme C3 . The smartphone  has a good price, good gaming performance, 3 multi-camera clusters and a big screen.

Screen water droplets follow the trend

Having a screen size of up to 6.5 inches but thanks to the trendy water drop design , thin bezels and a new 20: 9 aspect ratio, the Realme C3 looks very compact and elegant.

With a big screen, the experience of reading newspapers, watching movies or playing games on Realme C3 will be extremely interesting and comfortable.

The back of Realme C3 is also cared for with beautiful concentric circles, creating special reflection effects when changing the viewing angle. High quality plastic material for a firm, smooth grip.

sanpham.review: The best is yet to come! Give your walls a voice with a framed poster. This aesthethic, optimistic poster will look great in your desk or in an open-space office. Painted wooden frame with passe-partout for more depth.
sanpham.chitiet:
Laptop Acer Aspire A315 34 C2H9 (NX.HE3SV.005) belongs to the good-price office laptop segment equipped with configuration to meet basic learning and entertainment needs and pre-installed with Windows 10 copyright for usability. More stable and efficient.

Compact design, convenient

The Acer Aspire A315 34 C2H9 (NX.HE3SV.005) has a weight of 1.7 kg and a thickness of 19.9 mm making it easy to carry the device anywhere, convenient for your study and work.

Stable configuration, enough to use

The Acer Aspire A315 34 is powered by an Intel Celeron processor and 4 GB RAM for smooth use of office applications as well as basic web and entertainment needs.

Laptop has a battery life of 5-6 hours , you can comfortably work with basic office tasks such as writing documents, surfing the web, listening to music, ...

In addition, the ultra-fast SSD hard drive with a capacity of 256 GB is sufficient for your computer to perform boot-up operations, launch applications faster, save more time.

sanpham.review: The best is yet to come! Give your walls a voice with a framed poster. This aesthethic, optimistic poster will look great in your desk or in an open-space office. Painted wooden frame with passe-partout for more depth.
sanpham.chitiet:
Asus VivoBook X409JA i3 (EK015T)  compact laptop suitable for students, students or office workers. With a powerful 10th-generation CPU, laptop configuration is enough for you to comfortably use office applications, surf the web, entertain every day.

Lightweight, portable

ASUS VivoBook has a compact, elegant design with exquisite lines. The machine weighs 1.5 kg for you to bring your laptop to school, work easily.

Configurable enough for learning, office work

10 Generation Intel Core i3 processor with 4 GB RAM for stable performance, smooth office use, web browsing and casual entertainment.

See also:  Understanding microprocessor generation 10

With SSD 512 GB , you take less than 15 seconds to boot. 512 GB capacity for comfortable storage.

sanpham.review: The best is yet to come! Give your walls a voice with a framed poster. This aesthethic, optimistic poster will look great in your desk or in an open-space office. Painted wooden frame with passe-partout for more depth.
sanpham.chitiet:
Asus VivoBook X509FA Laptop (EJ857T) with modern appearance, stable configuration, fast operation promises to successfully complete daily office and entertainment tasks.

Strong performance for office people

The 8th Gen Intel Core i3 laptop is good for those who often use computers for office work, drafting contracts or bookkeeping, recess can watch movies, listen to relaxing music. .

Comes with 4 GB RAM smooth multitasking, simultaneously use 7-8 tabs work at the same time easier, no lag.

Start up quickly, minimize waiting time for opening applications with a 512 GB SSD . Comfortable storage of document files, important data.

If the purpose of your laptop is to store information, the Asus VivoBook X509FA will help you upgrade when an HDD slot is available.

The laptop has the common communication ports USB 2.0, HDMI, USB 3.0, USB Type-C and Micro SD card reader slot to help you easily connect the laptop to the presentation device, confidently express yourself.

sanpham.review: The best is yet to come! Give your walls a voice with a framed poster. This aesthethic, optimistic poster will look great in your desk or in an open-space office. Painted wooden frame with passe-partout for more depth.
sanpham.chitiet:
Lenovo IdeaPad S145 Laptop 15IIL i3 (81W8001XVN) is an office studying laptop with enough configuration, luxurious appearance, thin and light maneuver. The device is equipped with an SSD hard drive with a clear 15.6-inch Full HD screen.

Configuration suitable for learning needs, office

With 10-generation Intel Core i3 chip (released in late 2019), 4 GB RAM , the configuration is not too strong but it is enough to run popular applications such as Word, Excel, ... watch movies on Youtube or listen to Smooth music.

SSD is super fast

The laptop uses a   modern SSD hard drive , for impressive speed, booting the machine in less than 20 seconds . It also meets the needs of storing learning materials and tasks with a capacity of 256 GB enough.

Elegant design, luxury

With a classy gray shell, elegant lines and a weight of just 1.79 kg , Lenovo IdeaPad S145 is a modern, portable laptop. You can easily put it into backpacks, bags to carry daily to school or work.

sanpham.review: The best is yet to come! Give your walls a voice with a framed poster. This aesthethic, optimistic poster will look great in your desk or in an open-space office. Painted wooden frame with passe-partout for more depth.
sanpham.chitiet:
Lenovo IdeaPad S145 15IIL i5 (81W80021VN)  has a slim and trendy design, convenient for those who need to move as much as students, students, office workers. With the latest generation Intel Core i5 chip and SSD hard drive, laptop brings fast, high performance performance.

Modern, slim design

It has a quite thin design compared to other 15.6-inch laptops in the same segment, weighing 1.79 kg easy to carry your computer with you daily. The back is minimalist, only the company logo is placed on the left side for modern beauty and sophistication.

Office use and 2D graphics

The Lenovo IdeaPad S145 uses a 10th-generation Core i5 chip launched in the second half of 2019, comes with 8 GB of RAM  for stable multitasking, so you can listen to music, surf the web and work smoothly in Photoshop.

SSDs respond quickly

Laptop equipped with  512GB SSD hard drive  for fast processing speed, users only need about 20 seconds to boot the machine. 512 GB storage allows you to store documents, movies, software ...
